title: No Sound on Shen Ult
body: Anytime an allied Shen ults me I no longer hear the chant or whatever you wanna call it. This is game changing for me because I would've engaged had I known he was ulting me. During  a team fight the shield was burned up so fast I couldn't see it to use it as a visual indicator. He's always yelled that "TSsSsssuuuuuuuaaaaaaaaaahhhhh" while hr channels his ult and I'm really hoping it's a bug and not intended.

replies.body: That my friend is a problem. I'm looking into it right now and hope to have an answer for you last in the day.

Hey everyone,

Not promising anything, starting off with that :P

We are currently looking at Shen's ultimate. I will agree that it feels bad, when someone runs away when you ultimate them and then they try to turn and get back in the fight. There are a couple ways we can solve this or add to it and I will make a post when we have something locked in if we are going to do something about it.

Thanks for posting and caring about this everyone!

Ranger XIV
I mentioned this in another post, but why not add a visual indicator like this "Eye of Twilight" above the target while channeling. Like TF Ult but purple and more ninja-ish.

If Shen is next to you and ultimates, you will hear the chanting. I think that is the very common misconception. If he was across the map, you did not get that.

Yes you are right, an ally never hears the chanting Shen does while ulting, only the shield sound.

It's the shield sound we're talking about, its too quiet now since the rework. It used to be much louder. Countless times where I never noticed my Shen ally ulting onto me because the shield sound it creates is quieter than normal.
What about the bugfix tho?

I thought it was me, but yes, the sound that plays when Shen ults onto an ally has drastically reduced since the rework. All you have to do is increase the volume of that sfx playing.
You can here a sound, but the sound effect is really low and strange. You relly need to edit the sound effect :/
